content: **gauge** 22 stitches and 29 row = 10 x 10 cm in st st using 3 5 mm needles check gauge and adjust needle size if necessary **note** body and sleeves are worked in the round from lower edge to underarms then joined to work yoke in the round round begins at the left side of body on yoke round begins on the left side of back at the joining of body and sleeve material yarn fjallalopi yarn for design in grey 3056 - grey sky 3059 - raven black 3051 - lily white 3054 - frost grey yarn for design in yellow 3040 - summer yellow 3051 - lily white 3024 - glacier sand 3071 - misty rose
